entries.name: koldosTombCompleted
entries.text: Thank you so much for finding this blade. I shall treasure it.

children.name: nextSteps
children.text: Any idea what I should do next?
children.response: Head back into the Catacombs and head out the back door. That will lead you to further adventure.

children.name: where
children.response: Very near to Koldo's Tomb. You can't miss it. It's an iron door.

children.name: mayIPass
children.text: Good evening, good knight. May I pass?

children.name: confirmLocation
children.text: Is this the entrance to the Catacombs?

children.name: howToProceed2
children.text: Is there not some test where I may prove my worth?

children.name: iKnewIt
children.text: I knew it. What is it?
children.response: Legend has it that in a hidden tomb in the Catacombs lies a legendary blade. I should like to add it to my collection.

children.name: proceed
children.response: It's in Koldo's Tomb, if it exists at all. But none have every discovered it. If you find it for me, I can help you on your own journey.

children.name: accept
children.response: Speak to Dedric first, if you can. He's behind the warped door.

children.name: reject
children.text: I don't know. That sounds like stealing.
children.response: Fair enough. Good evening to you!

children.name: nevermind
children.text: Uhh. You appear to be busy. I'll be on my way.
